tool_description: Get data about  characters from Marvel Vs Capcom 2 game.
name: Marvel Vs Capcom 2
title: Marvel Vs Capcom 2

api_list.name: Show Moves
api_list.description: Show Moves For A Specific Character
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marvel-vs-capcom-2.p.rapidapi.com/characters/Akuma/moves"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marvel-vs-capcom-2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://marvel-vs-capcom-2.p.rapidapi.com/characters/{name}/moves"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marvel-vs-capcom-2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
